snippet: Verlander, the Detroit Tigers ace, had muscle repair surgery after injuring himself last month during off-season conditioning.
abstract: Detroit Tigers ace Justin Verlander has muscle repair surgery after injuring himself during off-season conditioning; he is expected to need six weeks of rehabilitation before being evaluated again.
lead_paragraph: Verlander, the Detroit Tigers ace, had muscle repair surgery after injuring himself last month during off-season conditioning.

headline.main: Justin Verlander Has Muscle Repair Surgery
